statements: UPDATE nanomaterials SET molecular_weight = 25.75, melting_point = 1300.00 WHERE material_id = 1;
UPDATE nanomaterials SET band_gap_energy = 3.25, chemical_formula = 'Au2Se3' WHERE material_name = 'Gold Selenide';
UPDATE nanomaterials SET material_name = 'Carbon Nanotubes', chemical_formula = 'C60', molecular_weight = 720.50 WHERE material_id = 1;
UPDATE nanomaterials SET band_gap_energy = 2.85, melting_point = 327.50 WHERE material_id = 2;
UPDATE Molecular_Structures SET molecular_weight = 50.75 WHERE material_id = 1;
UPDATE Analysis_Data SET analysis_result = 'Positive' WHERE material_id = 3;
UPDATE Molecular_Structures SET material_name = 'Aluminum', molecular_weight = 26.982 WHERE material_id = 1;
UPDATE Analysis_Data SET analysis_result = 'Pass', analysis_date = '2022-08-15' WHERE analysis_id = 3;
UPDATE Nanomaterials SET molecular_weight = 23.45 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Researchers SET affiliation = 'University XYZ' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE Nanomaterials SET molecular_weight = 15.5 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Characterization SET analysis_results = 'Positive' WHERE technique = 'XRD';
UPDATE Nanomaterials SET material_type='Carbon Nanotubes' WHERE material_id=1;

UPDATE Nanomaterials SET material_name = 'Graphene', material_type = 'Carbon', molecular_structure = 'Hexagonal lattice' WHERE material_id = 1;

UPDATE Nanomaterials SET material_name='Graphene Oxide', structure='2D', size=100 WHERE material_id=1;
